function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smart home devices for health monitoring can lead to privacy concerns and data security risks.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to health data, potential misuse of personal information.","Mitigation":"Implement strong data encryption, user authentication, and regular security updates.","Technologies":"Data encryption, user authentication protocols, security updates.","People":"Smart home residents, individuals using health monitoring apps.","Owner":"Smart home technology companies, developers of health monitoring apps."},{"Description":"Exposure to electromagnetic waves from 5G technology may have potential health risks.","Impact":"Unknown long-term health effects, public health concerns.","Mitigation":"Review scientific evidence, conduct public health impact assessments, monitor data as it becomes available.","Technologies":"Health impact assessments, scientific research, data monitoring.","People":"General public, individuals exposed to 5G technology.","Owner":"Government health agencies, scientific researchers, technology regulators."},{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive study of smart home technologies and their social implications may result in unforeseen societal challenges.","Impact":"Social issues, ethical dilemmas, impact on human interaction and behavior.","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth studies, engage in interdisciplinary research, and consult with social scientists and ethicists.","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary research, social science studies, ethical consultations.","People":"Smart home residents, society at large.","Owner":"Research institutions, social scientists, smart home technology companies."}]}
